Module neidische.narwale.hp
Package gamelogic

Class PlayerMat

java.lang.Object
gamelogic.PlayerMat
public class PlayerMat extends Object
The class PlayerMat contains the decks, energy cubes and checkpoints of one specific player
Author:
Tim Kriegelsteiner

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerMat()
    constructor of playerMat fills the deck with programming cards
